title: Larry Nassar was stabbed after making a comment while watching a women's Wimbledon match, source says
description: The inmate suspected of stabbing Larry Nassar in a Florida prison over the weekend was set off after the former sports doctor made a comment while watching a women's Wimbledon match on television, a source with knowledge of the investigation said Wednesday.

title: Inflation is easing. What does that mean for your grocery bill?
description: As inflation continues to fall, grocery bills are seeing some relief. New data provides an up-close look at how inflation is impacting food costs.

title: Pro-Trump protester Ray Epps files defamation suit against Fox News
description: Lawyers for Epps accused Fox News of telling a "fantastical story" that he fueled the violence that erupted at the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.

title: Why Gen Z has such a problem with the period in texting
description: Some Gen Zers think using the period in texting is passive-aggressive and mean. NBC News' Aaron Gilchrist talks to students and academics about possible reasons for this viewpoint.

title: Reproductive rights groups file suit to stop Iowa's new 6-week abortion ban
description: A group of reproductive rights groups said Wednesday they had sued to stop Iowa's newly passed six-week abortion ban from going into effect.

title: Remember that smoke? This summer, get used to it
description: It’s the summer of smoke with no end in sight.

title: Biden vows U.S. and allies 'will not waver' in defense of Ukraine
description: President Biden will seek to boost his image as an international coalition builder in a speech following two days of high-stakes meetings with leaders at the NATO summit.

title: Wrongful death lawsuit against Meta, Google alleges social media radicalized Buffalo Tops shooter
description: The gunman who killed 10 Black people in a racist attack at a Buffalo, New York, grocery store in 2022 was radicalized on social media, a lawsuit says.

title: From 'Succession' to 'Abbott Elementary,' here's the full list of 2023 Emmy nominees
description: Nominations for the 75th Primetime Emmy Awards were announced July 12 as viewers are rooting for “The White Lotus,” “Succession,” “Ted Lasso” and “Abbott Elementary.”

title: A year out from peak inflation, travel and leisure (mostly) cost less
description: It took a while, but Americans are just about done catching up on experiences lost during the pandemic. One exception: wealthy travelers are still splurging on trips abroad.

title: Tennessee surgeon fatally shot in 'targeted attack' by patient in exam room, police say
description: A Tennessee surgeon was fatally shot by a patient in an exam room Tuesday afternoon in an act police described as a “targeted” attack.

title: High levels of a hazardous chemical polluted the air weeks after the Ohio train derailment, an analysis shows
description: Near the train derailment site in East Palestine, Ohio, concentrations of a chemical called acrolein were up to six times higher than normal, a study found.

title: China-based hackers breached email accounts, Microsoft says
description: Hackers in China recently broke into the email accounts of around 25 organizations, including multiple government agencies, Microsoft said.

title: Bill Gates outlines 5 areas of concern over AI
description: Bill Gates has outlined five areas of concern he has about the advancement of artificial intelligence but says the challenges are "manageable." NBC’s Jacob Ward weighs in on the promises and pitfalls of AI.

title: Showdown coming? Biden to meet a disappointed Zelenskyy at NATO summit
description: Biden in Europe live updates: President to meet with Zelenskyy during NATO summit

title: Trump's attack on Iowa's popular governor hints at a vulnerability in the state
description: The neutrality of many GOP elected officials is a counterpoint to the narrative that Trump is on a glide path to the 2024 nomination.

title: Vermont slowly turns to recovery as floodwaters begin to recede
description: Floodwaters receded in Vermont cities and towns pummeled by a storm that delivered two months of rain in two days, allowing officials to focus on recovering from the disaster

title: Iowa Republicans pass a new 6-week abortion ban
description: Iowa Republicans passed a bill late Tuesday to ban most abortions after six weeks — a restrictive measure that would quickly remake the reproductive rights legal landscape in a key early voting state.

title: Freedom Caucus won't say if Marjorie Taylor Greene has been booted: 'It's none of your business'
description: As lawmakers returned to Washington this week, confusion still reigned over the status of the Georgia Republican's membership in the conservative group.

title: Ron DeSantis says he wouldn't be Trump's running mate: 'I'm not a No. 2 guy'
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said Tuesday he would not be former President Donald Trump’s running mate if given the opportunity to join him on the ticket.
